        @Deprecated
public void start(android.app.Activity activity,
                              android.os.Bundle bundle,
                              RegisterPaymentHandler handler)
        Deprecated. 
        Starts the main activity of the SDK. It is started with startActivityForResult and the request Code is PIA_SDK_REQUEST
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity from where the SDK is started.
        bundle - Bundle parameters needed to start the activity.
        handler - Register Payment handler.

      • initiateMobileWallet

        public static boolean initiateMobileWallet(PaymentProcess.WalletPayment walletPayment,
                                           boolean showProgressIndicator,
                                           WalletPaymentRegistration paymentRegistration)
        Attempts to initiate MobilePay payment and returns *true* if successful. Returns *false* if MobilePay is not installed; Lead user to a different payment method.
        Parameters:
        showProgressIndicator - True to show PiaSDK's standard progress indicator
        paymentRegistration - Object handling payment registration with `WalletURL` callback Note: Callback with `null` if registration is unsuccessful.

      • initiateMobileWallet

        public static boolean initiateMobileWallet(PaymentProcess.WalletPayment walletPayment,
                                           WalletPaymentRegistration paymentRegistration)
        Attempts to initiate MobilePay payment and returns *true* if successful. Returns *false* if MobilePay is not installed; Lead user to a different payment method.
        Parameters:
        paymentRegistration - Object handling payment registration with `WalletURL` callback Note: Callback with `null` if registration is unsuccessful.
